segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar like it's the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far that the stool is tipping dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit worried for his safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing nearby, waiting for a cookie, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they both are going to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, and the floor is wet and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why their mother isn't paying attention to what they're doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in her own little world, drying those dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should do something, but I'm not sure what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope they don't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is making me really nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR
